patterns.description: Claims to be support from Microsoft, Apple, or Amazon — these companies don't cold-call you.

patterns.pattern: your computer is (infected|at risk|blocked) by a virus
patterns.description: Pop-up or call claiming your device is infected with a virus.
Fake pop-up instructing you to call a toll-free support number.
Instructs you to install remote access software — this gives the scammer full control of your computer.

patterns.pattern: we will refund \$?[0-9,.]+ to your (bank account|card).*we sent (too much|extra money)
patterns.description: Refund overpayment scam — claims they sent too much and asks you to return the difference.
